item.title: Understanding Neural Radiance Fields (NeRFs)
item.description: Imagine being able to generate photorealistic 3D models of objects and scenes that can be viewed from any angle, with details so realistic that they are indistinguishable from reality. That’s what the Neural Radiance Fields (NeRF) is capable of doing and much more. With more than 50 papers related to NeRFs in the CVPR 2022, it is one of the most influential papers of all time. Neural fields A neural field is a neural network that parametrizes a signal.
